languages.text: "Надо было вздернуть несколько ваших самовольно образовавшихся семей. Никаких потерь в исходной численности, но важный урок порядка для всех вас".
"They should have hanged a few of your unauthorised families. You would have learned an important lesson in maintaining order, without falling below your initial head count."
languages.original_text: "Надо было вздернуть несколько ваших самовольно образовавшихся семей. Никаких потерь в исходной численности, но важный урок порядка для всех вас".

traits.locale_text: "They should have hanged a few of your unauthorised families. You would have learned an important lesson in maintaining order, without going below your initial head count."
"They should have hanged a few of your unauthorised families. You would have learned an important lesson in maintaining order, without going below your initial head count."
"They should have hanged a few of your unauthorised families. You would have learned an important lesson in maintaining order, without falling below your initial head count."
"They should have hanged a few of your unauthorised families. You would have learned an important lesson in maintaining order, without falling below your initial head count."
"They should have hanged a few of your unauthorised families. You would have learned an important lesson in maintaining order, without falling below your initial head count."
"They should have hanged a few of your unauthorised families. You would have learned an important lesson in maintaining order, without falling below your initial head count."

languages.text: «Deberían haber colgado a algunas de sus familias no autorizadas. Les habrían dado una lección importante sobre mantener el orden sin reducir sus números por debajo de la cantidad inicial».
languages.original_text: "They should have hanged a few of your unauthorised families. You would have learned an important lesson in maintaining order, without falling below your initial head count."

traits.locale_text: «Deberían haber colgado a algunas de sus familias no autorizadas. Les habrían dado una lección importante sobre mantener el orden sin reducir sus números por debajo de la cantidad inicial».

languages.text: “那些法务官当初就该抓几个未经批准的家族杀鸡儆猴，把他们全家老小统统绞死。这样既能维持秩序，又不会导致人数锐减。我们应当从这件事情中吸取教训。”
languages.original_text: "They should have hanged a few of your unauthorised families. You would have learned an important lesson in maintaining order, without falling below your initial head count."

traits.locale_text: “那些法务官当初就该抓几个未经批准的家族杀鸡儆猴，把他们全家老小统统绞死。这样既能维持秩序，又不会导致人数锐减。我们应当从这件事情中吸取教训。”

languages.text: 「許可されていない家族の何人かは吊るされるべきだったろう。当初の人数を下回っていなければ、命令を守ることの重要な教訓を学んだだろう」
languages.original_text: "They should have hanged a few of your unauthorised families. You would have learned an important lesson in maintaining order, without falling below your initial head count."

traits.locale_text: 「許可されていない家族の何人かは吊るされるべきだったろう。当初の人数を下回っていなければ、命令を守ることの重要な教訓を学んだだろう」

languages.text: « Ils auraient dû pendre quelques-unes de vos familles clandestines pour l'exemple. Vous auriez ainsi appris une leçon capitale en matière de maintien de l'ordre, sans pour autant que vos effectifs initiaux en pâtissent. »
languages.original_text: "They should have hanged a few of your unauthorised families. You would have learned an important lesson in maintaining order, without falling below your initial head count."

traits.locale_text: « Ils auraient dû pendre quelques-unes de vos familles clandestines pour l'exemple. Vous auriez ainsi appris une leçon capitale en matière de maintien de l'ordre, sans pour autant que vos effectifs initiaux en pâtissent. »

languages.text: "Şu kayıt dışı ailelerin bir kısmını asmaları gerekirdi. Başlangıçtaki mevcudun altına düşmeden düzeni korumak konusunda önemli bir ders almış olurdunuz."
languages.original_text: "They should have hanged a few of your unauthorised families. You would have learned an important lesson in maintaining order, without falling below your initial head count."

traits.locale_text: "Şu kayıt dışı ailelerin bir kısmını asmaları gerekirdi. Başlangıçtaki mevcudun altına düşmeden düzeni korumak konusunda önemli bir ders almış olurdunuz."

languages.text: "Sie hätten einige Eurer nicht autorisierten Familien hängen sollen. Ihr hättet eine wichtige Lektion in punkto Ordnung lernen können, ohne Euren anfänglichen Personenbestand zu unterschreiten."
languages.original_text: "They should have hanged a few of your unauthorised families. You would have learned an important lesson in maintaining order, without falling below your initial head count."

traits.locale_text: "Sie hätten einige Eurer nicht autorisierten Familien hängen sollen. Ihr hättet eine wichtige Lektion in punkto Ordnung lernen können, ohne Euren anfänglichen Personenbestand zu unterschreiten."
